EmailTemplate.name: CR 7.4 Reject due to references
EmailTemplate.subject: Reference - [candidate name] not suitable to work on programme
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact your local staffing team.
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Following your recent phone call with the Staffing Team we are sorry to say that feedback from one or both of your referees suggests that you are unsuitable to work on our NCS programme.
This decision is final and was made with reference to our strict employment policy guidelines.
We thank you for your interest in The Challenge.
Best wishes,
The Challenge
Email reference: CR 7.4
